message.content:
cs.NI, cs.AI, cs.SE, cs.DC, cs.DS 

This paper focuses on the architecture for automating the selection of sensors and processing of sensor data in the context of IoT. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). Additionally, the paper proposes the use of context awareness and automated reasoning, which suggests the categories cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.SE (Software Engineering) as likely sub-categories. The paper also discusses the challenges of selecting appropriate sensors and processing large amounts of data, which could fall under the categories cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
